DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare clinical efficiency conventional fixed appliance orthodontic treatment supplement daily application cyclic force dentition via removable ( AcceleDent ) vibrational appliance . The primary outcome measure rapidity tooth alignment ; whilst secondary outcome measure include pain discomfort treatment , rapidity orthodontic space closure , change arch dimension root length .
DOC.brief_title: Intermittent Vibrational Force Orthodontic Tooth Movement
DOC.criteria: Subjects recruit sample consecutive case attend routine fix appliance orthodontic treatment conventional preadjusted edgewise bracket satisfy follow criterion : permanent dentition ; requirement extraction premolar unit quadrant ; incisor irregularity 512 mm . medical contraindication ; craniofacial anomaly cleave lip/palate ;
